昨日の友は今日の敵: (きのうのともはきょうのてき) - A friend today may turn against you tomorrow
昨日今日: (きのうきょう) - (yoji) yesterday and today; (something that happened) only yesterday (just recently)
昨春: (さくしゅん) - last spring; the spring of last year
昨秋: (さくしゅう) - autumn of last year; fall of last year
昨非今是: (さくひこんぜ) - (yoji) complete reversal of values or ways of thinking
昭々: (しょうしょう) - clear; bright; plain; obvious
昭代: (しょうだい) - glorious reign; enlightened era
昭和: (shouwa) - Shōwa era (25 de dezembro de 1926 - 7 de janeiro de 1989), Showa era
昭和の日: (しょうわのひ) - Showa Day (national holiday; April 29)
昭和一桁: (しょうわひとけた) - (yoji) (member of the generation born in) the first nine years of the Showa period (from 1926 to 1934)
昭和元禄: (しょうわげんろく) - (yoji) the flourishing mid-Showa period (1960s and early 1970s) of peace, rapid economic growth, and life of ease
昭和史: (しょうわし) - history of the Showa period (1926.12.25-1989.1.7)
昭和年間: (しょうわねんかん) - Showa era
昭和恐慌: (しょうわきょうこう) - Showa Depression (Japanese part of the Great Depression)
昭和時代: (しょうわじだい) - Showa period (1926-1989 CE)
昭和維新: (しょうわいしん) - Showa restoration (call for Imperial restoration by militarists in the 1930s)
昭昭: (しょうしょう) - clear; bright; plain; obvious
昭栄: (しょうえい) - Shoei (motorcycle helmet manufacturing company); Shouei
昭然: (しょうぜん) - manifest; clear; evident; obvious
昭陽舎: (しょうようしゃ) - court ladies' residence (in the inner Heian Palace)
是々非々: (ぜぜひひ) - (yoji) free and unbiased; fair and just; ruling or judging what's right is right and what's wrong is wrong; calling spade a spade
是が非でも: (ぜがひでも) - rightly or wrongly; by all possible means
是っ切り: (これっきり) - last time (as of now)/never again; only this
是れ: (これ) - this (indicating an item near the speaker, the action of the speaker, or the current topic); this person (usu. indicating someone in one's in-group); now; here; I (me); certainly
是丈: (これだけ) - so many (few); so much (little)
是位: (これぐらい) - this much; this amount
是切り: (これぎり) - last time (as of now)/never again; only this
是式: (これしき) - trifle; insignificant thing; (only) this much
是彼: (これかれ) - this and that; this person and that person/anybody
是是非非: (ぜぜひひ) - (yoji) free and unbiased; fair and just; ruling or judging what's right is right and what's wrong is wrong; calling spade a spade
是是非非主義: (ぜぜひひしゅぎ) - principle of being fair and just; fair and unbiased policy (unbiassed)
是生滅法: (ぜしょうめっぽう) - the law of arising and ceasing; the law of creation and destruction
是程: (これほど) - so; so much; this much
是見よがし: (これみよがし) - for show; ostentatious; flaunting; showing off
是非: (zehi) - certamente, sem falta; certo e errado, prós e contras
是非とも: (zehitomo) - by all means (com a sensação de não aceitar um "não" como resposta)
是非に及ばず: (ぜひにおよばず) - unavoidable; inevitable; cannot be helped; of necessity
是非共: (ぜひとも) - by all means (with sense of not taking "no" for an answer)
是非判断: (ぜひはんだん) - (yoji) discrimination of right and wrong; distinguishing between right and wrong
是非善悪: (ぜひぜんあく) - (yoji) rights and wrongs; the relative merits (of a case); propriety
是非是非: (ぜひぜひ) - certainly; by all means
是非曲直: (ぜひきょくちょく) - rights and wrongs (of a case); relative merits (of a case)
昴宿: (ぼうしゅく) - Chinese "Hairy Head" constellation (one of the 28 mansions); Pleiades; Seven Sisters
昴星: (すばるぼし) - Chinese "Hairy Head" constellation (one of the 28 mansions); Pleiades; Seven Sisters
昼すぎ: (ひるすぎ) - just past noon; afternoon
昼の部: (ひるのぶ) - daytime; noon period of the day; matinee
昼も夜も: (ひるもよるも) - day and night
昼三: (ちゅうさん) - highest ranking prostitute in Yoshiwara (from the Houreki era onward)
昼休み: (ひるやすみ) - lunch break; noon recess; noon rest period
昼光色: (ちゅうこうしょく) - daylight color; daylight colour
昼光色電球: (ちゅうこうしょくでんきゅう) - daylight lamp
昼前: (ひるまえ) - forenoon; just before noon
昼夜を分かたず: (ちゅうやをわかたず) - by day and night; day and night
昼夜を舎かず: (ちゅうやをおかず) - continuing day and night
昼夜兼行: (ちゅうやけんこう) - (yoji) around-the-clock; (working) day and night
昼夜帯: (ちゅうやおび) - women's obi with a different colour on each side (originally black and white)
昼夜逆転: (ちゅうやぎゃくてん) - (yoji) one's days and nights being reversed
昼尚暗い: (ひるなおくらい) - dark even in the daytime
昼日中: (ひるひなか) - daytime; noon; broad daylight
昼猶暗い: (ひるなおくらい) - dark even in the daytime
昼礼: (ちゅうれい) - afternoon assembly (at a company, etc.)
昼行性: (ちゅうこうせい) - diurnality/daytime activity; diurnal
昼行灯: (ひるあんどん) - person who does not stand out; (useless as) a lantern at noon day
昼過ぎ: (ひるすぎ) - just past noon; afternoon
昼間: (hiruma) - dia, durante o dia, período do nascer ao pôr do sol, período diurno
昼間人口: (ちゅうかんじんこう) - daytime population
